item.title: [317] How to change new players start equipment [317]
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

Okay guys!
This is how you can change the armour that a new player starts with.
Difficulty 0.5/10 REALLY easy ;).
Files edited:player.java
Okay let’s get started!
open up player.java
Search for:

playerEquipment[playerHat]

and you should see this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=2910; playerEquipment[playerCape]=4405; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2906; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495; playerEquipment[playerHands]=2912; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2904; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=882; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;
all the…

playerWeapon playerArrows

… and stuff means that fx. if your

playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;

that means the new players that logs in is wearing dragon scimitar (4587 = item ID for dragon scimitar ;)).
So change it to whatever you want ;).
[size=14pt]Done ;)! That’s all for now hope you enjoyed! Any questions or errors? Post in reply! ;).[/size]
Credits:
50% to me for making guide :D.
50% to MoparScape for this awesome website :D.

Read full topic
